forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
